Description:

Conquer the world! Spend your people through the centuries - 
from the time of the dawn of civilization to the era of space 
exploration. Unleash war, wage negotiations, perform scientific 
discoveries - build the greatest empire in the history of mankind. 

Free admission

Convenient, friendly, elegantly designed interface allows beginners 
to quickly get in the game world. Veterans also will appreciate the 
depth, detail, and management capabilities, glorified episode. 

Communication and creativity

Civilization V - a game for like-minded people. Compete with players 
from all over the world or compete with friends on a local network. 
Make any modifications to and download other people without 
leaving the game. 

Earthly Beauty

Explore and conquer a beautiful and truly live a world created 
with the help of graphics technology of last generation.

Features:
Improved system of diplomacy, which allows to approach the most 
treacherous and warlike rulers.Great musical accompaniment and 
sound effects, recorded especially for Civilization V.Independent 
city-state, or policies that can be used to their advantage when 
playing in the diplomatic arena.The playing field, broken into 
hexagons - hexes, which opens up new strategic options for 
military action and for building.
